article: One day my wife and I went shopping by car. We had a lot of things  to buy  , because my brother and  _  family were coming to spend the weekend with us. We stopped the car  in front of  a stone. An hour later,we came back to the car.  _  of us carried a lot of things. Then trouble started. We could not open the car door. "Oh,dear,"said my wife. "  _  are we going to do?" "Let's ask that policeman," I said. The policeman was very kind  _  was glad to help us. A few minutes later, he got the door  open  . Just at that moment,  _  angry man came up and shouted, "What are you doing  _  my car?" We looked at the number of the car,and our  _  turned red.
